tooltip.manual_input: CTRL + Left Click to input manually
tooltip.uncheck_achievement: Uncheck to hide a specific achievement tracker

modal.message: You have completed all of the achievements this mod tracks!

a_true_hunter.name: A True Hunter Is Never Satisfied

someone_worth_following.name: Someone Worth Following
someone_worth_following.description: Completed 100 quests with your Palico deployed.

east_to_west.name: East to West, A Hunter Never Rests

impregnable_defense.name: Impregnable Defense
impregnable_defense.description: Forged five different pieces of armor with Rarity 7 or higher.

power_is_everything.name: Power Is Everything
power_is_everything.description: Forged five different weapons (NON ARTIAN) with Rarity 7 or higher.

explorer_of_the_eastlands.name: Explorer of the Eastlands
explorer_of_the_eastlands.description: Obtained 10 different special items of Rarity 6.

mini_crown_collector.name: Miniature Crown Collector
mini_crown_collector.description: Obtained a miniature crown for 10 or more monsters in the Hunting Log.

mini_crown_master.name: Miniature Crown Master
mini_crown_master.description: Obtained a miniature crown for many monsters in the Hunting Log.

giant_crown_collector.name: Giant Crown Collector
giant_crown_collector.description: Obtained a gold crown for 10 or more monsters in the Hunting Log.

giant_crown_master.name: Giant Crown Master
giant_crown_master.description: Obtained a gold crown for many monsters in the Hunting Log.
